forum: website feedback forum for technical support, feedback and questions about the autosport.com website. suggestions and constructive criticisms are welcome as well.

racing comments the place for debates on the current affairs of formula 1, rallying, motogp, nascar, v8, indycar, and all other forms of motorsport. be warned: arguments are welcome, personal insults are not. subforum: rc's bets & games

forum: the paddock club forum for full members only (those with at least 30 posts on the board). the place to talk about (almost!) any non-motorsport topic, while sipping champagne and socialising with others. to gain access you have to pm the paddock bouncer slartibartfast and beg...
racing simulators the place to find out which racing simulator to buy, what is the recommended set-up and how to improve your lap times
the technical forum the place to discuss the technical aspect of f1, including driving techniques, engine statistics and aerodynamics

forum: the nostalgia forum a forum dedicated to the research, study, discussion, and just plain ol' talking about the history of motor sports. questions are always welcomed; variety is encouraged. if you have an interest in the history of motor sports, this is the place to be! subforums: motorcycle racing nostalgia, racing collectables, historical research
grand prix travelling going to a grand prix? been there, done that -- and want to share your experience? post your questions and comments here
